channel.title: NPC, Help PLS!
channel.description:
hey everyone that helps out on this post will get free stuff on my server lol :P (once its up, about 57% done) anyway, i just wanted to know how to fix this stupid dodgy crap i keep getting... I am using testscape source, and i move the 2 shops i made, well shop keepers (Jatix and Diango) to below the varrock stores (because otherwise they wont trade and i get connection lost etc..) and when i do that all the monsters drops are stuffed up they either dont drop or drop cooked sharks :S .. What do i do... :( if i remove the shops and the npcs i added it works but if i add an npc it stuffs up the drops :( i have it correct the code is: (in the autospawn.cfg)
spawn = 587 3086 3258 0 3255 3404 3250 3399 1 Jatix's Herblore Shop spawn = 970 3082 3247 0 3255 3404 3250 3399 1 Diango's Market Store
shops.cfg
shop = 41 Diango's_Market_Store 2 2 4613 1000 4621 1000 3695 1000 6889 1000 6563 1000 6568 1000 shop = 42 Jatix's_Herblore_Shop 2 2 249 1000 251 1000 253 1000 255 1000 257 1000 259 1000 261 1000 263 1000 265 1000 267 1000
client.java
} else if (NPCID == 970) { //Diango's Market Store PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 41; } else if (NPCID == 587) { //Jatix's Herblore Shop PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 42;
Thanks for ya time people :P cheers, Sheepy :)[br][size=1]Posted at: November 05, 2006, 12:40:04 AM[/size][hr]+2 rep for whoever helps me and a big grin :) ~Sheepy

just take them out [br][size=1]Posted at: November 05, 2006, 01:33:00 AM[/size][hr]change this

} else if (NPCID == 970) { //Diango’s Market Store
PutNPCCoords = true;
WanneShop = 41;

        } else if (NPCID == 970) { //Diango's Market Store
           PutNPCCoords = true;
           WanneShop = 41;

item.title: NPC, Help PLS!
item.dc:creator: @Sheep Sheep
item.description:
@Sheep wrote:

hey everyone that helps out on this post will get free stuff on my server lol (once its up, about 57% done) anyway, i just wanted to know how to fix this stupid dodgy crap i keep getting…

I am using testscape source, and i move the 2 shops i made, well shop keepers (Jatix and Diango) to below the varrock stores (because otherwise they wont trade and i get connection lost etc…) and when i do that all the monsters drops are stuffed up they either dont drop or drop cooked sharks :S …

What do i do… if i remove the shops and the npcs i added it works but if i add an npc it stuffs up the drops i have it correct the code is:
(in the autospawn.cfg)

spawn = 587 3086 3258 0 3255 3404 3250 3399 1 Jatix's Herblore Shop spawn = 970 3082 3247 0 3255 3404 3250 3399 1 Diango's Market Store

shops.cfg

shop = 41 Diango's_Market_Store 2 2 4613 1000 4621 1000 3695 1000 6889 1000 6563 1000 6568 1000 shop = 42 Jatix's_Herblore_Shop 2 2 249 1000 251 1000 253 1000 255 1000 257 1000 259 1000 261 1000 263 1000 265 1000 267 1000

client.java

} else if (NPCID == 970) { //Diango's Market Store PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 41; } else if (NPCID == 587) { //Jatix's Herblore Shop PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 42;

Thanks for ya time people
cheers,
Sheepy :)[br][size=1]Posted at: November 05, 2006, 12:40:04 AM[/size][hr]+2 rep for whoever helps me and a big grin
~Sheepy
